function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to wastewater samples during analysis","Impact":"Risk of spreading contagious diseases through direct contact with wastewater","Mitigation":"Implement strict safety protocols and use personal protective equipment (PPE)","Technologies":"Biological safety cabinets, fume hoods, and autoclaves for decontamination","People":"Laboratory staff, researchers, and facility personnel","Owner":"Laboratory management and research institution"},{"Description":"Use of mass spectrometric equipment and analysis","Impact":"Risk of exposure to aerosols and potential airborne contamination","Mitigation":"Perform the analysis in a controlled environment with proper ventilation and air filtration","Technologies":"HEPA filters, laminar flow hoods, and air purifiers","People":"Laboratory staff, researchers, and facility personnel","Owner":"Laboratory management and research institution"},{"Description":"Handling and manipulation of chemical reagents and solvents","Impact":"Risk of chemical exposure leading to compromised immune systems and susceptibility to infections","Mitigation":"Provide training on safe handling, storage, and disposal of chemicals, and use appropriate PPE","Technologies":"Chemical fume hoods, safety showers, and spill containment systems","People":"Laboratory staff, researchers, and facility personnel","Owner":"Laboratory management and research institution"}]}
